label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"肉仔鸡常见病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"突然蹦跳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"倒地","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"尖叫","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"猝死","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡猝死症是肉仔鸡常见病，整个鸡群生长发育良好的肉仔鸡多发，一般不表现明显的前驱症状，在吃料、饮水过程中或闲散期，突然蹦跳、倒地、尖叫而猝死。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"非传染性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":56,"end":59,"text":"猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡猝死症为非传染性疾病，无特定的病原因素，很多致病因素均可使肉仔鸡发生猝死症，归纳起来常见的、导致肉仔鸡发生猝死症的原因可能有如下数种：

label: [{"start":2,"end":10,"text":"营养过剩性猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"胃肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":79,"text":"腹区异常增大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":75,"end":79,"text":"异常增大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":89,"text":"机械性压迫胸腔器官","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":80,"end":85,"text":"机械性压迫","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":73,"end":75,"text":"腹区","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":85,"end":89,"text":"胸腔器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":94,"end":96,"text":"肺脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":107,"end":109,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":115,"end":117,"text":"肺区","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":118,"end":121,"text":"胸气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":122,"end":125,"text":"腹气囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 1.营养过剩性猝死症肉仔鸡猝死症多发生于生长发育良好而肥胖的肉仔鸡，这种肉仔鸡体脂积蓄多，肌肉丰满，各个内脏器官也特别充盈发达，尤其肝脏和胃肠，使腹区异常增大，机械性压迫胸腔器官，当心脏和肺脏受到压迫时，直接影响到心脏的生理搏动和肺区、胸气囊、腹气囊的呼吸功能。

label: [{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":39,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":41,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"腹腔器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":70,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":71,"end":73,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":96,"end":102,"text":"心跳骤然停止","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":103,"end":105,"text":"猝死","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 正常情况下，鸡的生理搏动为300次/分，应激代偿性搏动可达500次/分，如果心、肺和气囊长期受到腹腔器官的这种机械性挤压，则心脏不堪重负，肺和气囊丧失气体交换的能力，当超过它们的代偿极限时，使心跳骤然停止而猝死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":12,"text":"微量元素硒缺乏性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":56,"end":60,"text":"抗氧化剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 2.微量元素硒缺乏性猝死硒是鸡的必需微量元素，它可维持机体细胞膜的完整性，参与辅酶Q的合成，它还是一种活性很强的抗氧化剂，降低汞、铅、银等重金属毒物对机体的毒害作用；

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":40,"text":"肌肉营养不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":46,"text":"出血性素质","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"营养不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"红细胞崩解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"崩解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"胰腺坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"慢性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":69,"text":"神经调节障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":69,"text":"调节障碍","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":86,"text":"猝死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"胰腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"神经","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡生长发育迅速，代谢旺盛，对硒的需要量增加，当长期缺乏时，则出现肌肉营养不良，出血性素质，红细胞崩解，胰腺坏死，慢性中毒，神经调节障碍，由量变到质变，不见前驱症状而猝死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"疾病性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":14,"text":"多杀性巴氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":32,"text":"急性败血性传染病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 3.疾病性猝死多杀性巴氏杆菌引起的禽霍乱，是一种急性败血性传染病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"小肠球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":42,"text":"肠痉挛性腹痛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"痉挛性腹痛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"心搏骤停","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"猝死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡感染此病后，则不见前驱症状而突然死亡；肉仔鸡感染小肠球虫病时，由于肠痉挛性腹痛和自身中毒，当强烈应激刺激时，惊飞狂跳，心搏骤停而猝死；

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"脂肪肝综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"质度变脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"极易破裂出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"猝死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡患脂肪肝综合征时，由于肝脏肿大，质度变脆，极易破裂出血而猝死；

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"异物性肺炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"肺脏炎性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"脏炎性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":47,"text":"异物性气管梗塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"梗塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":56,"text":"肺循环障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"循环障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"窒息","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":52,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 由于大肠杆菌病、异物性肺炎、有害气体的刺激，引起肺脏炎性出血、瘀血和肺水肿，以及异物性气管梗塞时，造成肺循环障碍，呼吸困难，窒息而死亡；

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"传染性喉气管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":19,"text":"喉头和气管有出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"喉头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":28,"text":"气管有凝血块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"凝血块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":37,"text":"炎性坏死物的梗塞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"窒息猝死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 传染性喉气管炎时，由于喉头和气管有出血，常因气管有凝血块和炎性坏死物的梗塞而窒息猝死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"中毒性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"有机磷杀虫剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"灭鼠药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":72,"end":78,"text":"破坏血液循环","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":79,"end":85,"text":"抑制呼吸中枢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":86,"end":90,"text":"心搏过速","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":98,"end":102,"text":"呼吸麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":103,"end":105,"text":"猝死","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 4.中毒性猝死误食某些剧毒药物，如有机磷杀虫剂、灭鼠药，某些治疗药物如喹乙醇应用时超剂量、超疗程、配伍禁忌等违反操作规程时，直接损伤肝脏、肾脏，破坏血液循环，抑制呼吸中枢，心搏过速，最后导致心跳和呼吸麻痹而猝死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"中暑性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":65,"text":"丧失体温调节功能","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"循环障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":75,"end":81,"text":"呼吸中枢麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":82,"end":84,"text":"猝死","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 5.中暑性猝死在炎热酷暑季节，高温高湿，防暑降温措施不当，一旦室温超过肉仔鸡的生理耐受极限时(33～35℃),使之丧失体温调节功能，就会引起循环障碍，呼吸中枢麻痹而猝死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 这种猝死，对于密集饲养的鸡群损失很大，应引起特别关注。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"惊吓性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"交感神经","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":77,"text":"肾上腺素","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":83,"end":91,"text":"心搏超限超强加快","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":92,"end":98,"text":"冠状动脉挛缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":96,"end":98,"text":"挛缩","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":99,"end":107,"text":"心脏供血供氧障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":101,"end":107,"text":"供血供氧障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":110,"end":114,"text":"心搏骤停","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":120,"end":122,"text":"猝死","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":124,"end":129,"text":"群体性发生","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":92,"end":96,"text":"冠状动脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":99,"end":101,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 6.惊吓性猝死雷雨闪电、高分贝噪音、生人入舍、陌生色彩以及鸟兽侵扰等突如其来的强烈应激刺激时，肉仔鸡会阵发本能的保护性应激反应，交感神经异常兴奋，肾上腺素分泌增加，使心搏超限超强加快，冠状动脉挛缩，心脏供血供氧障碍，导致心搏骤停而死亡。这种猝死可使群体性发生，引起重大损失。

label: [{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"中毒性猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"猝死","labels":["disease"]},{"start":79,"end":88,"text":"保持环境的相对安静","labels":["control"]},{"start":57,"end":66,"text":"创造优越的环境条件","labels":["control"]}]
text: 由上所述，可见引起肉仔鸡的猝死原因甚多，但是，除中毒性猝死之外，都与应激因素有关，所以在肉仔鸡的饲养管理过程中，要创造优越的环境条件，消除各种刺激性应激因素，保持环境的相对安静，防止猝死的发生，减少经济损失。

label: [{"start":17,"end":26,"text":"碎玉米粒加入日粮中","labels":["control"]},{"start":41,"end":47,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 此外，从10日龄开始，按3%～5%碎玉米粒加入日粮中，25日龄以后逐渐停止，可预防肉仔鸡猝死症的发生。

label: [{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"清瘟败毒散","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 35日龄后，饲料中加入清瘟败毒散，也有一定的预防效果。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肉鸡猝死综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":16,"text":"急性死亡综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"翻筋斗病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"肉用仔鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肉鸡猝死综合征又叫急性死亡综合征、翻筋斗病，多发生于生长快速的肉用仔鸡，发病突然，死亡率高。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"综合性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"强直性惊厥","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 病鸡表现为共济失调，并发展为强直性惊厥为特征的一种综合性疾病。

label: [{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 发病原因不清，有报道认为肉仔鸡猝死症的发生与应激因素密切相关，如免疫接种和更换饲料、环境气候的突变、噪声过大和光照突变产生的应激等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"公鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"母鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":50,"end":51,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":56,"end":57,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肉仔鸡猝死症一般发生于1~8周龄的肉鸡，发病高峰在2~3周龄，公鸡的发病率约为母鸡的3倍，生长过快的鸡比生长慢的鸡发病率高。

label: [{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"突然发病","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"尖叫","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"跳起","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"失去平衡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":53,"text":"向前或向后跌倒","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"翅膀扑动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"扑动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"肌肉痉挛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"痉挛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"双腿蹬动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"蹬动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"翅膀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"双腿","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 一年四季均可发生，无传染病流行规律。病鸡临死前没有明显症状，突然发病，尖叫、跳起，失去平衡，向前或向后跌倒，翅膀扑动，肌肉痉挛，双腿蹬动，继而死亡。

label: [{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"背卧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"伏卧姿势","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"双腿外伸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"竖起朝天","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":44,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":59,"end":60,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"一腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"双腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"外伸","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 从丧失平衡到死亡时间很短，死后有明显的背卧或伏卧姿势，一腿或双腿外伸或竖起朝天。死亡的鸡多是同批中生长最快、外表健康的鸡。

label: [{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"肉色新鲜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":36,"text":"肌胃充满刚采食的饲料","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"空虚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 无特征性病理变化。死鸡体壮，剖解发现肉色新鲜，嗦囊和肌胃充满刚采食的饲料或空虚。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"心房扩张瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"扩张瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"内有凝血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"心室通常紧缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"紧缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"呈长条状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"质地硬","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"内无血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"易碎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":49,"text":"胆囊一般空虚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"空虚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"肾脏出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"变白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"肺脏瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心房","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"心室","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"肺脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心房扩张瘀血、内有凝血。心室通常紧缩呈长条状，质地硬。内无血液。肝脏肿大、苍白、易碎。胆囊一般空虚，肾脏出血、变白。肺脏瘀血和水肿。

label: [{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"粉末饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"限制饲养","labels":["control"]}]
text: 不用颗粒饲料或破碎饲料而用粉末饲料，对3~20日龄的鸡进行限制饲养，可避开生长过快期发病。

label: [{"start":9,"end":19,"text":"晚上逐步减少亮灯时间","labels":["control"]}]
text: 限饲的方法一般采取晚上逐步减少亮灯时间。从4日龄开始就逐步增加熄灯时间，以每天增加1小时达到整晚都熄灯，25日龄后再逐步增加亮灯时间，35日龄后可整晚亮灯。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"碳酸氢钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":27,"text":"药溶于饮水中连饮","labels":["control"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"碳酸氢钠","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 碳酸氢钠，每只鸡用量为0.62g,将此药溶于饮水中连饮3天，或用碳酸氢钠以每吨饲料中添加3.6kg。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强科学管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"保持环境安静","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":34,"text":"鸡舍时要选择远离交通干线","labels":["control"]},{"start":54,"end":60,"text":"肉仔鸡猝死症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 加强科学管理，保持环境安静，减少应激因素，建鸡舍时要选择远离交通干线、人口稠密的地区，车鸣、鞭炮声等都会诱发肉仔鸡猝死症的发生。

label: [{"start":1,"end":7,"text":"逐步更换饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":46,"end":47,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":55,"end":62,"text":"保持垫料的干燥","labels":["control"]}]
text: 要逐步更换饲料，变换突然是应激因素之一。过湿、霉变、粉尘过多的垫料不仅可诱发一些特定的病，对鸡也是一种刺激，要保持垫料的干燥。

label: [{"start":22,"end":33,"text":"在饲料中添加抗应激药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":33,"text":"抗应激药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"琥珀酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"延胡索酸","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 滴免、分群、测重、更换饲料、气候变化等，可先在饲料中添加抗应激药物如琥珀酸、延胡索酸等。
